text: BIGFUN magically materialize next to VID VICTIM ONE. The in her hand have turned into jellybeans. She is ridiculou
J.D. pulls out a gun with an ethereal expression on his f
We've made MTV. J.D. fires into the radiant image of BIGFUN, destroying t T.V. and disgusting VERONICA, who bolts off the couch. He raucously crawls after her.
We're breaking up. I am out!
Wha-at? Come on, there's another T.V. in the kitchen. You know you used to have a sense of humor. J.D. playfully tackles VERONICA. This calms rather than a She turns on her back. J.D. follows suit.
You're getting too cool for me, J.D. I don't know how to talk to you.
Our relationship's moving fast, I know, but I have real, real respect for you. VERONICA sighs, then rolls over into a crawling position eventually into a walking-out-the-door position.
I'm going to make this Ms. Pauline thing work. Lines of communication between the cliques. You were a phase....

Phase my ass! You'll be  back ! I'm storming Normandy beaches and you're running in place with Pauline Fonda's airhead peacenik exercise program. Have to stay tough! You'll be back. J.D. bounds up to a kitchen counter and flicks on a small BIGFUN can be heard booming their song. J.D. broods.

J.D. moves to an empty row of desks. He turns the first d to face the second. HEATHER DUKE warily lowers herself in second desk as J.D. flops a manilla envelope onto it. HEA DUKE opens the envelope and pulls out a stack of 8 by 10' She gasps. The first shot shows a YOUNG HEATHER DUKE in a summer cam uniform that vibrantly reads HEATHER, She is holding one of a large poster board drawing of two Eskimos rubbing no Holding the other end, in a summer camp uniform vibrantly reading MARTHA, is a YOUNG MARTHA DUNNSTOCK/DUMPTRUCK.
What the..... With a harsh laugh, she takes in the next photograph. It YOUNG HEATHER DUKE and YOUNG MARTHA eating toasted marshmallows off each other's sticks.
(trying to stay clam)
Where did you get these?
Oh, I just had the  nicest chat with Ms. Dumptruck. Got along famously! It's scary how everyone's got a story to tell....Would you care to see the canoeing shots?
What do you want from me?
Strength. Westerburg doesn't need mushy togetherness, it needs a leader. Heather Chandler was that leader but...
But she couldn't handle it. J.D. laughs. She's on the ball.

I think you can. In Catcher in the Rye Holden says his ideal job'd be making sure some kids don't fall off a cliff. He doesn't realize if you pay too much attention to the kids, you'll back off the cliff yourself.
Very very. The photographs?
Don't worry. I'll ask you to do me a favor. You'll get the negatives and everything back then. J.D. launches away from his desk with a grin. He places a red ribbon on HEATHER DUKE's desk.
In the meantime, strength, And hey, there's a little gift.

A spooked HEATHER DUKE splashes water on her face and loo into the mirror. In a trance, she pulls her hair back Hea Chandler fashion and ties it with the ribbon J.D. gave he A BETTY FINN-A-LIKE moves up to the sink beside her. Two BABES enter the bathroom with pouting expressions. Seemin in a trance, HEATHER DUKE bends over and wipes off her we hands using the oblivious BETTY FINN-A-LIKE's dress. HEAT DUKE winks to the now-giggling CHIC BABES and saunters of
HEATHER DUKE bursts through the bathroom door to wickedly strut down the hall. She scowls/smiles in perfect Heather Chandler fashion to various passers-by.
VERONICA genially lobbys the big black EARL FRAZIER.
Let me get it clear, Veronica. You want yourself a sweet homeboy for this T.V. show so you can show everybody what a loose, Martin Luther Cosby-lovng place Westerburg is.
(chuckling)
Something like that. Will you do it?
Damn, you're a shrewd one. Shrewd.
I just want to show different kinds of people can get together and it doesn't have to be Vietnam. You don't get treated badly here do you?
I don't get treated at all, but hey, don't worry about it. I'll do your thing. It'll give my Mom a smile. VERONICA hands him a Guest Pass tag.
Things are going to change, Earl.
Uh-huh. HEATHER DUKE impishly blinds VERONICA with her hands.
Guess who?
Heather. HEATHER DUKE lets go with a small giggle. VERONICA turns face her Heather Chandler-looking friend and her smile di VERONICA violently pushes HEATHER DUKE away and storms of
Lying on the floor, VERONICA concentrates on her phone. W a deep sigh, she pushbuttons out a number. She pauses, th
Ouch. Your machine's got the most obnoxious beep. Heather, I'm sorry.
VERONICA's voice drones through HEATHER DUKE's answering VERONICA (O.S./machine)
I'm just calling to say you can wear your hair any way you want to. A Male hand picks up the phone. It's College boy DAVID.
Hey Veronica Sawyer, barf on anybody's carpet lately?
VERONICA cringes.
Is this David? Heather's David? What are you doing....
What can I say? I was pretty broken up by Heather C.'s suicide. I needed somebody super-sensitive like Heather D.
I'm delirious for the both of you. Can you put Heather on?
DAVID proudly looks down off-screen to his lap.
She can't really talk right now.

VERONICA slams down the receiver and pulls up a sleek lea address book. She severely scans through it. Tossing it a VERONICA then descends into the sundry junk of her night table drawer and draws up another address book; this one frayed and pink polka-dotted. She peruses it and dials...
Hello, Betty.....
BETTY FINN hits her ball through a wicket and squeals in delight. VERONICA has a motherly smile on her face.
I don't believe it. I'm winning.
Don't get cocky, girl. BETTY bends down to shoot then raises her body back up.
I missed you. I know I'm not as, as exciting as your other friends.
That's bullshit. Just shoot. BETTY once again bends and raises.
Ronnie, I'm still a virgin.
(warmly)
Shoot. BETTY finally shoots. Feebly.
Betty, your daydreams are a lot better than my realities, believe me. I'm afraid though it's time to get your butt kicked.
Ronnie! VEONCIA gigglingly shoots, but misses the wicket. And ins hits BETTY's ball. Disturbed by the sudden dilemma, she determinedly walks to her ball and moves it away from BET
Hey, you're not settling for the two shots are you? Knock me out girl. It's the only way.
It's not my style, okay?
Nice guys finish last. I should know. VERONICA sighs then knocks BETTY's adjacent ball sailing toward the porch and a statuesque HEATHER DUKE who does not budge as the ball whizzes past her.
Brav- o
(nervously)
I've got to get going, Veronica. See you at the studio.
Sure. See ya. HEATHER DUKE walks toward the girls followed by a meander desultory HEATHER MCNAMARA, who picks up a green mallet a fragilely swings it; her early robustness a forgotten mem
Croquet won't be the same without Heather. HEATHER DUKE hustles back toward a passing BETTY FINN.
Oh Betty, wait. I almost forgot...The Whitney James Teenage Suicide Prevention T.V. Special isn't going to be taped at the studios. It's going to be done in the Park.
But I thought...
(heading back)
It's going to be like a big picnic. Bring some potato salad...HEY, I'M RED!
HEATHER DUKE's red ball slams into HEATHER MCNAMARA's gre
Shit.
So did you call people to tell them how to get to the studio tonight? HEATHER DUKE savagely "sends" HEATHER MACNAMARA's ball in the flower bed.
Back off. I called everyone, even that Stoner slut. Felt like giving my phone a bath. I told Betty just now...Damn! HEATHER DUKE's shot swerves wide of the wicket.
You're so polluted. Talking down to people, making fake notes.... VERONICA blows her shot.

I don't see what gives you the right to lecture,  Ronnie . You were soulmates with Betty Finn until you realized you're the cover of Seventeen magazine and she's the before half of a Scarsdale Diet ad. HEATHER DUKE bashes her ball into VERONICA's and prepares to send it.

Some people just don't matter. Why should those who do carry their weight? Am I right? As HEATHER DUKE swings down her mallet, VERONICA steps on own ball. When HEATHER DUKE's mallet makes contact, the t balls slam against each other, unmoving, with a loud smac

The hallway slowly clears as STUDENTS go to class. The be rings. A LATE STUDENT races through the empty hallway. VERONICA carefully hatches out of her locker. She treads the hallway as if something were about to jump out at her

A group of cheerleaders including HEATHER MCNAMARA are la doing cartwheels on the gym floor. On a small stage set u beside them, other STUDENTS are putting up folding chairs PRINCIPAL GOWAN says "Testing" into a microphone. J.D., toting the gym bag, quietly opens the gym door and inside. He swiftly moves unnoticed to a position undernea the bleachers.
VERONICA peers around a corner to see an empty hallway.
Using heavy black masking tape, J.D. tapes a thermal bomb steel support beneath the bleachers. Other thermal bombs be discerned taped to other supports.

VERONICA cautiously treads down the empty hallway, trying keep in control. Suddenly, packs of STUDENTS burst from classroom doors behind VERONICA. The excited swarms of STUDENTS move toward and past VERONICA, who has braked he troubled treading to stiffly contemplate her passing peer She latches onto Geek RODNEY in a panic. RODNEY looks dow his clutched arm with a nervous smile.
Rodney, where's everybody going?
It's Friday.....
Oh my God, the damn pep assembly....
Yeah, these things are pretty artificial, but at least we all get out of class... VERONICA ignores RODNEY's amiable attemots at conversatio inquisitively move forward through the crowd.
J.D. darts from out underneath the bleachers to the gym d He pops the doors open and sees the crowd of STUDENTS mov toward the gym. He suavely pauses then dashes down a near set of stairs.

head_text.subj: THE HALLWAY LEADING TO THE GYM

text: VERONICA continues to tensely surf the tidal wave of STUD heading for the gymnasium. She stops to watch her classma file into the gym like lemmings with increasing sense of dread. She again latches onto a passing RODNEY.
Rodney, what's underneath the gym? RODNEY (unconsciously) dramatically stops, turns to VERON and says........
The boiler room. VERONICA blanches then lunges through the crowd. She topp couple disgruntled STUDENTS before careening down the staircase beside the gym.

J.D. walks by the firm glass windows of the boiler room, eyeing the pounding generators inside. He stops at a heav steel door. Placing down his gym bag, J.D. proceeds to sw pick the lock. He swings open the steel door.
May I see your hall pass? J.D. weilds around. A sweating VERONICA moves toward him, pointing the bedroom gun at him.
I knew that loose was too noose! I mean, noose too loose! Goddamn you!

Like father, like son. A serious-as- fuck bomb in the boiler room that'll set off a pack of thermals upstairs. Okay, so let's start by slowly putting the bomb down on the ground. J.D. looks down at the gym bag already on the ground. He folds his arms and smiles. VERONICA forcefully moves clos
Okay, okay. I knew that. I knew that. Put your hands on your head.
You didn't say Simon Says. J.D. suddenly kicks out into VERONICA's stomach, doubling over and causing her to drop the gun. J.D. gracefully retrieves it.

The pep assembly is in full swing with rowdy STUDENTS in bleachers earthily shouting, giggling cheerleaders making swaying pyramids, valiant band members struggling to be h Various Jocks, including EARL, stand on the stage with PRINCIPAL GOWAN as a YEARBOOK PHOTOGRAPHER flashes away.

head_text.subj: THE HALLWAY BEFORE THE BOILER ROOM

text: VERONICA bends over quivering and clutching her bruised r J.D. raises the gun to her head.

Live by the sword... VERONICA swings her left arm up knocking J.D.'s gun hand upward. She then sails her right fist into his face. The annoys him more than it hurts him but J.D.'s momentary lo composure allows VERONICA to come in with another much ha right hook. The blow sends J.D. stumbling back against th boiler room, jarring the gun loose. They simultaneously lunge for the gun. VERONICA, having t better grip, pulls so forecfully that after wrenching the from J.D., she loses control of it, flinging it down the VERONICA pops up to retrieve it but J.D. moves his legs scissors-style around her and trips her.

The assembly mindlessly blares on. Cheerleader HEATHER MCNAMARA rah-rah-rahs. RODNEY and the other Geeks pass ar a pair of opera glasses, all intensely scoping out the cheerleaders. A group of STONERS toke away beneath the bleachers, one of them lackadaisically leaning against a thermal bomb.
A snarling J.D. stands up, pulling VERONICA with him.

You think just because you started this thing, you can end it? J.D. violently kisses/bites VERONICA. While kissing, VERO sees a fire alarm on a nearby wall. She closes her eyes t savagely knees J.D. in the groin. VERONICA bolts to the a and pulls it down. Nothing happens. J.D. gasps.

You, really didn't think I'd, forget, forget, to disconnect the.... VERONICA rockets her body down and picks up the gun. J.D. grabs her and throws her against the steel boiler room do A jostled VERONICA raises the gun. J.D. howls then bounds toward VERONICA, causing them both to careen down the ste steps of the boiler room. At the same time, he inadverten kicks the gym bag/bomb down along with them. The gun spin from VERONICA's hand and slides away. The bomb flies out the bag onto the boiler room floor. A digital clock on the bomb clicks on at 5:00....4:59....4:58...

The frenzied pep assembly crowd is now doing "The Wave". FINN and her similar co-horts deliriously get into the ac all sit in a circle at the bottom rows of the bleachers, pouting as STUDENTS bounce up and down around them. EARL the other Jocks stand on the stage grinning and preening before the crowd.

VERONICA and J.D. are in a heap at the bottom of the boil room steps. VERONICA faintly works into a semi-sitting position and gives an astonished glance to the bomb, its digital clock clicking to 3:00. VERONICA crawls to the gu levels it at a rousing-up J.D.
The bomb's gone on, J.D.! How do you turn it off? Tell me! Fully standing, J.D. flicks open his switchblade. He give VERONICA "the finger," screaming in exploded saliva...

Fuck you! Seething, VERONICA shoots up at J.D. blowing off "the fin Shrieking in pain, J.D. drops the knife to hold this sudd geyser of blood. VERONICA achingly stands, pointing the g The bomb clicks down to 2:25.
It's all over, J.D. Help me to stop it.

You want to wipe the slate clean as much as I do. Okay, so maybe I am killing everyone in the school because nobody loves me. You have a purpose though! Remember? Let's face it, the only place different social types can genuinely get along with each other is in heaven. VERONICA fires the gun at J.D.'s feet. The bomb clicks to
How do you turn the fucker off?

You're not listening. People are going to look at the ashes of Westerburg and say there's a school that self-destructed not because society didn't care, but because that school  was society. Is that deep or what? I'll let you put it in your diary, babe. Free of charge.
The bomb, asshole!
Just push the red button twice. That's what stops it. If that's what you want, babe?
You know what I want, babe?
What? VERONICA fires the gun twice into J.D.'s throat. Coughing moaning, he splatters against a generator.
Cool guys like you out of my life. VERONICA saunters to J.D.'s writhing body.

But babe, don't worry, these here were Ich Luge bullets. J.D. closes his eyes and slumps to the ground. VERONICA t to the bomb and crouches over it. A lit green light is ne a green button. Above it, an unlit red light is next to a button. The bomb's digital clock clicks to 00:17. VERONIC presses the red button twice, turning on the red light an stopping the clock. VERONICA falls back into a sitting position and sorely exhales, tears streaming down her fac

A cheerleader does a cartwheel in slow motion as eerie mu plays. The manic crowd in the bleachers vibrates in slow motion as well. At normal speed, VERONICA walks to the doors of the Gym a peers in. The panorama of roaring students, posing jocks, prancing cheerleaders continues to unfold in slow motion. VERONICA walks away from the gym.

head_text.subj: EXT. THE FRONT OF THE SCHOOL DAY

text: VERONICA wearily pushes open the front door and emerges outside of the school. She closes her eyes to therapeutic bask in the sun's rays. A slight smile trembles onto her A strange voice kills it.
Color me impressed. J.D. stands starkly in the distance before her, blood spu from his throat onto his gunslinger coat. He painfully sp through his assasinated vocal cords.
You really fucked me up, Veronica.
(vertigo city)
I thought I...you..
You've got power, Veronica. Power I didn't think you had. The slate is clean. J.D. pulls open his coat revealing that the bomb is attac his torso. The green light is on and the clock says 00:10

Pretend I did blow up the school. All the schools. Now that you're dead, what are you gonna do with your life? VERONICA takes the unlit cigrette from her blazer pocket puts it in her mouth. She then folsd her arms.
Perfecto. J.D. raises his arms in a crucifixion pose as the bomb cl to 0:00. Nothing happens. An annoyed J.D. breaks out of h crucifixion stance and raps the bomb with his palm.
The sound of the bomb explosion plunges the cheering up-a down pep assembly into chaos. Wailing students pour out o bleachers screaming less out of fear than a "Whoa Dude" s of excitement.

VERONICA stands in the same position in front of the scho with her arms still folded. Only now her cigarette is lit her face and clothes are blackened in ash. Flames flicker bushes behind her. VERONICA drags on the cigarette and tu to go inside.
VERONICA strolls into the school and into a hallway of ho students, some of whom are tearing down Prom banners for thrill of it. HEATHER DUKE rushes up to VERONICA and grim
Veronica, you look like hell.
Yeah, I just got back. VERONICA tosses away the cigarette. She then grabs HEATHE DUKE by the shoulders and forcibly turns her around.
What are you doing?

Heather, my love, there's a new sheriff in town. VERONICA takes off HEATHER DUKE's red ribbon and ties it around the hair of her own head. She kisses HEATHER DUKE the cheek, leaving a black stain. VERONICA calls off.

Hey, Martha, wait up. MARTHA DUNNSTOCK/DUMPTRUCK revealed to be in an electric wheelchair, brakes to a stop and looks to Veronica, confu VERONICA walks up beside her. MARTHA starts up her wheelc and accompanies VERONICA away into a deserted hallway.
My date for the prom kind of flaked out on me, so I thought if you weren't doing anything that night we could go to the video store and rent some new releases or something. Maybe pop some popcorn.
I'd like that.
So would I. VERONICA and MARTHA continue gliding down the hall Bogart/Rains style.
